translations: [铁路]车厢（carriage 的复数）；四轮马车

phrs.translation: 客车；铁道车；（英）火车车厢
货运条件，运输条件；承运条件；运输条款

sentences.sentence: The company manufactured elegant railway carriages.
sentences.translation: 该公司生产雅致的火车车厢。

sentences.sentence: The tourist coaches [carriages] are in front.
What pin-money, what jewels, what carriages you will have!
sentences.translation: 你将要有多少零花钱，有多少珠宝，多少马车啊！
